name: GoJS
comment: GoJS is commercial, but I like some things about it

name: Cytoscape
comment: Cytoscape looks great, but doesn't have interaction support. Would be a serious contender, but it uses LGPL.

name: networkD3
comment: Has Sankey diagrams, and R, but not useful otherwise.

name: vis.js
comment: Very nice looking, one drawback, is that it doesn't seem to support user layout. Also modal editing.

name: The Grid
comment: Used by no-flo project.  Kind of awesome, also confusing. Might do some of what we want, but hard to say

name: MindMup MapJS
comment: MindMup is mind mapping software. MapJS is the graph part. AutoLayout, not for us.

name: JsPlumb
comment: looks like a very well maintained library. Good candidate
